message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to let it go for $20,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product is high to you, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $10,000 is significantly below its true value.  I could consider letting it go for $17,000. This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer but unfortunately, I cannot agree to $17,000. I am still only able to pay up to $10,000. I hope we can find a middle ground.
